org.apache.hadoop.tracing

Class SpanReceiverHost

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.tracing.SpanReceiverHost
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TraceAdminProtocol

    @InterfaceAudience.Private
public class SpanReceiverHost
extends Object
implements TraceAdminProtocol
    This class provides functions for reading the names of SpanReceivers from the Hadoop configuration, adding those SpanReceivers to the Tracer, and closing those SpanReceivers when appropriate. This class does nothing If no SpanReceiver is configured.

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static SpanReceiverHost getInstance(Configuration conf)

      • loadSpanReceivers

        public void loadSpanReceivers(Configuration conf)
        Reads the names of classes specified in the "hadoop.htrace.spanreceiver.classes" property and instantiates and registers them with the Tracer as SpanReceiver's. The nullary constructor is called during construction, but if the classes specified implement the Configurable interface, setConfiguration() will be called on them. This allows SpanReceivers to use values from the Hadoop configuration.

      • closeReceivers

        public void closeReceivers()
        Calls close() on all SpanReceivers created by this SpanReceiverHost.
